title: How do you beat the "get lvl6 befor round 11" mission...?
body:
Ive tried rushing gold too the point I sell everything and get 6 after the round 2 carosel(2-4) and I still haven't finished the mission.
The whole finish before 2-11 is broken or wrong...

replies.body:
I googled it and found an answer by Riot somewhere.
It is bugged right now.
The mission actually counts the starting carousel as the first shared draft, which is not intended.

It is not doable right now and will be replaced by an easy to do mission.

Can smb expplain me at least what means lvl6? i though there are idk? isnt it like lvl 3 by fusion 3 champs or lvl 9 by fusion 9? or lvl 2 by fusion 3 and lvl 3 by fusion 9? what lvl 6 means? Or i have to fusion 9 champs that costs 2? Sorry bout my english

> [{quoted}](name=Aeinewen,realm=EUNE,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=yVk9OIm5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-07-10T02:18:52.122+0000)
>
> Can smb expplain me at least what means lvl6? i though there are idk? isnt it like lvl 3 by fusion 3 champs or lvl 9 by fusion 9? or lvl 2 by fusion 3 and lvl 3 by fusion 9? what lvl 6 means? Or i have to fusion 9 champs that costs 2? Sorry bout my english

Your Little Legend must be level 6, not a character.
You guys should submit it as a bug, until someone from riot answers I'm done trying the mission.

I've run into the same issue.  I posted about it a little bit ago, and it has hundreds of views but no comments.

I had the exact same problem with the same mission on the PBE client, too.
